snippet: The White House delayed a plan to allow the recruitment of young, skilled immigrants with deportation deferrals.
abstract: Obama administration requests that Pentagon delay plan to allow small number of young immigrants who grew up in the United States without legal status to enlist in military; delay is intended to avoid any conflict with House Republicans considering whether to move forward on legislation that could grant legal status to illegal immigrants.
lead_paragraph: The White House delayed a plan to allow the recruitment of young, skilled immigrants with deportation deferrals.

headline.main: Pentagon Plan to Enlist Young Immigrants Is Delayed at White House’s Request
headline.print_headline: Pentagon Plan to Enlist Young Immigrants Is Delayed at White House’s Request

keywords.value: Dream Act (Development, Relief and Education for Minors Act)
